description: The ultimate file guide, sidewall trimmer and scraper sharpener guide. This modular system allows you to switch from a 2° to 3° angle guide to get your edges perfectly sharp. The 7° angle guide is ideal for sidewall trimming, while the 0° angle guide helps get your wax scraper back to its sharp state. Designed to be compatible with additional angle guide plates, it's the last angle guide you'll need.Made of 4.5mm-thick surgical grade stainless steel for durability.Modular 2°+3° and 0°+7° angle bar is precision milled from aircraft grade aluminum, sand blasted and anodized.Durable laser-etched angle number markings won't wear off.Disc position indicators provide best efficiency when sharpening and polishing edges.Wear plate cutout allows for sidewall filings and debris to fall away from base.Additional wear plate screw ports allow a second angular bar to be mounted. Extra angular bars sold separately.Compatible with all interchangeable Switch system components.
name: Tools4Boards Switch Cut Side Edge/Sidewall Tool
